backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing users, profiles, sales, expenses, and goals with access control, storage maps, and CRUD-style operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented account-switching and logout-related frontend changes with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing predefined short summaries of all major frontend components, screens, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and applying global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling authentication-driven navigation and screen rendering with offline sync and loading states.
frontend/src/components/IconTile.tsx: Clickable icon tile component used for selecting categories or activity types with selected-state visuals.
frontend/src/components/PrimaryActionBut: Reusable styled button component supporting variants, sizes, and optional icons for primary actions.
frontend/src/components/ProfitStatusChip: Chip showing today's profit with color-coded styling and trend icons.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBar.tsx: Simple wrapper around a progress component that clamps and displays goal progress.
frontend/src/components/SwitchAccountCon: Confirmation dialog warning users about logout and potential loss of pending offline actions before switching accounts.
frontend/src/components/SyncStatusChip.t: Floating chip showing online/offline status and number of pending offline actions.
frontend/src/components/TopBar.tsx: A header component showing a title with optional back and switch-account buttons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the current user's profile using the active actor and tracks loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for sales, expenses, cash, stats, goals, and mutations with offline support.
frontend/src/hooks/useSwitchAccount.ts: Clears offline data, query cache, and identity session to switch accounts.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/offline/offlineQueue.ts: Implements IndexedDB-backed offline action queueing and optimistic data storage.
frontend/src/offline/useOfflineSync.ts: Syncs queued offline actions when back online and refreshes cached data.
frontend/src/screens/AddExpenseScreen.ts: UI for recording an expense with amount and category, handling validation, creation, and account switching.
frontend/src/screens/AddSaleScreen.tsx: Screen to add a sale including amount and optional product, with form validation and account switching support.
Displays today's sales, expenses, and profit with motivational messaging and account switching.
frontend/src/screens/DashboardScreen.tsx: Main dashboard showing greeting, available cash, today’s profit, and navigation to key actions and summaries.
frontend/src/screens/MonthlyGoalScreen.t: Allows setting and viewing monthly financial goals with progress tracking and remaining amount calculation.
Initial profile setup where users enter their name and select an activity type before starting the app.
frontend/src/screens/WelcomeScreen.tsx: React welcome screen that shows a hero image, app title, and a start button that triggers Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/utils/calculations.ts: Utility functions computing available cash, daily profit, and monthly goal progress from sales and expenses.
frontend/src/utils/dates.ts: Date helpers for checking if timestamps are today or in a given month and retrieving current month/year.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Formats numbers into GNF currency strings and parses GNF input back into numeric values.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in session storage, and managing hash-based routing params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending colors, radius, shadows, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project’s state, architecture, features, and requirements for a finance-tracking mobile app.
